{{Infobox Berry |name = #67 Enigma |image = [[File:Enigma.png]] |caption = A completely enigmatic Berry. It apparently has the power of the stars that fill the night sky. |growtime = 1d |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |points = 15,000 |flavor =
*40 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Enigma''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by linking your game to a [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] account, obtaining 4 different hints from the Kanto [[Berry Master]] and surrounding an empty plot with berries according to those hints. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 hours || 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day - 7 days |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 day -
7 days || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 16 hours -
4 days 16 hours || 1,344 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 10 hours 40 mins -
3 days 2 hours 40 mins || 896 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Enigma berries. As the berries needed to be planted are unique to each save file, a general diagram is used here to describe where particular "hinted" berries should go. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | '''North Hint''' || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | |- style="height: 50px;" | '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' || || |- style="height: 50px;" | || '''South Hint''' || || '''North Hint''' || |- style="height: 50px;" | || || '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || '''South Hint''' || |} == Additional Mutations == Planting Enigma berries next to certain other berries will cause them to mutate. For all of these mutations, the goal berry must already be unlocked for the mutation to occur. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Original Berry !! Mutated Berry |- | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] [[Passho]] || [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] |- | [[File:Shuca.png|30px]] [[Shuca]] || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] |- | [[File:Coba.png|30px]] [[Coba]] || [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] |- | [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] |- | [[File:Chilan.png|30px]] [[Chilan]] || [[File:Apicot.png|30px]] Apicot* |- | [[File:Roseli.png|30px]] [[Roseli]] || [[File:Lansat.png|30px]] Lansat* |- | [[File:Haban.png|30px]] [[Haban]] || [[File:Starf.png|30px]] [[Starf]] |} (*These berries cannot be unlocked currently, and as such cannot be mutated into using this strategy.) {{Berries}}
